body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Wavelength Cars. My name is Bruce Rodriguez. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi there, my name is Ashley Hayes.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Ashley. Could you kindly provide me with your phone number and email address for further assistance?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five - six seven eight - nine one two three. And my email address is ashley.hayes@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Ashley. Your phone number is five five five - six seven eight - nine one two three, and your email address is ashley.hayes@example.com, correct?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the information, Ashley. Is there anything specific you would like to discuss or inquire about today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling happy with the service from Wavelength Cars, but I have a quick question about my recent purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that you're satisfied with our service, Ashley. Please go ahead with your question, and I'll do my best to assist you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Ashley. Have a great day!
